comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I've got a meeting at 1 pm so I'll probably hit the gym or do a quickie ride up Flag. -GES

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Bummer. By the time I get my bike picked up and re-tired, it'll no doubt be time to go back to work. Have fun up there, guys.

comments.author: Fuller
comments.body: Perfect conditions out there today. The sun was shining in the canyon but breezy the entire way. Were the frenzy crew there, we would have gladly stole your thunder on the hairpins. Trailrasta
